General.Name: GETT Gold Inc
General.Description: G.E.T.T. Gold Inc. engages in the exploration of precious metals in Canada. The company holds interest in the Courville Maruska project located in the Courville Township. It also provides thermal fragmentation mining technology for the mining industry. The company was formerly known as Nippon Dragon Resources Inc. and changed its name to G.E.T.T. Gold Inc. in December 2021. G.E.T.T. Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Brossard, Canada.
General.Address: 7055 Taschereau Boulevard, Brossard, QC, Canada, J4Z 1A7
